import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css' import axios from 'axios'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import FormGroup from 'react-bootstrap/esm/FormGroup'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; const Home = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [result, setResult] = useState([]); const [searchCountries, setSearchCountries] = useState(""); useEffect (()=>{ axios .all([ axios.get('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all'), axios.get('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/countries'), ]) .then( res => { setData(res[0].data); setResult(res[1].data); }) .catch(err=>{ console.log(err); }) },[]) const date = new Date(parseInt(data.updated)); const lastupdated = date.toString(); const filterCountries = result.filter(item =>{ return searchCountries !=="" ? item.country.includes(searchCountries) : item; }); const countries = filterCountries.map((data, i)=>{ return (
{data.country}
Deaths {data.deaths}
Recovered {data.recovered}
Today's cases {data.todayCases}
Active {data.active}
Critical {data.critical}
Cases {data.cases}
) }) return ( <>
Globally, as of there have been {} confirmed cases of COVID-19, including {} deaths, reported to WHO.
Confirmed
Last Updated {lastupdated}
Active Cases
Last Updated {lastupdated}
Fatalities
Last Updated {lastupdated}
Recovered
Last Updated {lastupdated}
{/*
setSearchCountries(e.target.value)} />
{countries} */}
setSearchCountries(e.target.value)} />
{ filterCountries.map((data, i)=>{ return( ) }) }
S.N Flag Country Total Active Today Case Critical Deaths Recovered
{i+1} {data.country} {data.cases} {data.active} {data.todayCases} {data.critical} {data.deaths} {data.recovered}
) } export default Home
